long_description: Brimming with no-nonsense expertise from "Survivorman" host Les Stroud,. Authors: Les Stroud and Michael Vlessides; photographs by Laura Bombier and illustrations by Beverley Hawksley. Softcover; 378 pages; black-and-white photographs and illustrations. Harper Collins; copyright 2008.
short_description: Brimming with no-nonsense expertise from "Survivorman" host Les Stroud, SURVIVE! leads you through the essential skills and techniques needed to weather unexpected situations in the wilderness.
